descriptionSet.description: The image is an advertisement for the tonic wine, Ladcovine. To the right of the image a lady can be seen, dressed in a blue sari and white blouse and holding a wine glass filled with Ladcovine in her right hand. The middle part of the image has the blurb of the advertisement detailing the ingredients as well as the uses of the tonic wine. To the left of the image, a bottle of Ladcovine is illustrated.

inscription.text: Ladcovine for the glow of health

Do you look pale and have a frequently recurring feeling of weariness which often makes you postpone business for the morrow? Then, you are in a state of sub-health which, if allowed to persist, will wreck your health and ruin your career.Ladcovine is ust the tonic for the treatment of this illusive malady.

Being a combination of Glycerophospates, Strychnine with digestive Malt Extract, Manganese and Copper in a palatable and energising base of Port Wine, it is an excellent tonic for all rundown conditions, nursing mothers, and brain workers. It speedily restores the unhealthy to health and to the healthy person it gives a glow of health which he or she never knew before.
Prepared under the strict supervision of the excise deptt.
The Lister Antiseptics & Dressings Co. (1928) Ld. Cossipore, Calcutta

Ladcovine A perfected tonic wine Prepared under Excise supervision with imported wine, glycerophosphates of sodium, potassium, calcium and strychnine, malt extract, copper, manganese etc The lister antiseptics & dressings co (1928) ltd Calcutta

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: An advertisement of Ladcovine Tonic Wine

To the right of the image a lady can be seen, dressed in a blue sari and white blouse and holding a wine glass filled with Ladcovine in her right hand.
